name: centipede_damascus
text: Pat doesn't like it when Ray talks about getting his bone on.

name: abe
text: Rays eyebrows are my new god.

name: deancain29
text: Pat's fear of the bone leads me to believe that he is hiding somthing.

name: tragicone
text: Somebody knows them something about predictions. Nostradamus

name: katsura
text: I'm more in awe of the pink walls, myself.

name: cdl146
text: Such a vaginal pink I have never seen. Except for vaginas, of course...

name: idsyen
text: I think I can accept George Clinton as an authority on this subject.

name: zefiel
text: So what was the favor? Did he borrow the Pink Elephant of the next strip from Pat?

name: philosophe
text: No... Pat was worthless.

name: ssddr
text: True, but innacurate in that it implies that in the furture pat became of some value, which he has not. The more accurate statement at this point would be "Pat is worthless"

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Pat! My pebbles are hanging out everywhere!"

name: unfun
text: I guess this was before Pat's answering machine straight up told you he was screening your call.

name: f1shst1ck
text: Love the color

name: spinynorman
text: Ray's house has gone from Legoish Barbie affair to a suburban mansion, possibly built by the Bluth Company. Is that an improvement? You decide.

name: tragicone
text: I had noticed this to. I thought, his house is monstrous in comparison. I thought maybe it was pat's house since he was on the other end of this transfer but the word bubbles do not corroborate this.

name: farqussus
text:
perhaps it's the pool house?

What? It could have it's own driveway!

name: wilbur
text: I don't think Ray actually gets rich until he makes it big with "Ass in Your Pants." Or at least it's never mentioned exactly how much money he has until that point.

name: woodenteeth
text: Ray isn't moving his lips... yet, he speaks... and has his hand in the air as if in the arse of a puppet. LOLcat: Invisible Ventriloquist Dummy. Fucking LOL cats.

name: seph
text: Ain't no one want to get ahold of Pat that bad. Not even to talk about their Bone.

name: dasilodavi
text: I kind of like the color scheme here.  The pink on pink suggests a lack of masculinity that Ray must feel now that his thong has been pilfered.

name: bixschmix
text: Does the fact that he's thongless also mean he's unable to wear his phone jacket? I am mightily confused.

name: heccibiggs
text: Well you can't wear a phone jacket without a thong. That would look RIDICULOUS.
